description: Set and/or get members' attributes of an Apache httpd 2.4 mod_proxy balancer pool

tls.description: Use https to access balancer management page.

balancer_vhost.description: (ipv4|ipv6|fqdn):port of the Apache httpd 2.4 mod_proxy balancer pool.

balancer_url_suffix.description: Suffix of the balancer pool url required to access the balancer pool status page (e.g. balancer_vhost[:port]/balancer_url_suffix).

member_host.description: (ipv4|ipv6|fqdn) of the balancer member to get or to set attributes to. Port number is autodetected and should not be specified here. If undefined, apache2_mod_proxy module will return a members list of dictionaries of all the current balancer pool members' attributes.

state.description: Desired state of the member host. (absent|disabled),drained,hot_standby,ignore_errors can be simultaneously invoked by separating them with a comma (e.g. state=drained,ignore_errors).
